name: uploaderx
title: uploaderX
description:
UploaderX lets you instantly upload files to your favorite cloud storage providers—directly from Raycast.
Supports S3-compatible storage (AWS S3, Cloudflare R2, Wasabi, Backblaze B2, MinIO, etc.) and non-S3 platforms like BunnyCDN.
Manage multiple accounts, set custom paths and get a shareable link—all from your keyboard.
author: scisaif

commands.name: manage-cloud-providers
commands.title: Manage Cloud Providers
commands.subtitle: Add, edit, or remove cloud storage accounts
commands.description: View, add, edit, and delete cloud storage accounts. Set the default upload provider and default path.

commands.name: upload-files
commands.title: Upload Files
commands.subtitle: Upload files to your cloud storage
commands.description: Select and upload files to your default cloud provider and default path.

commands.name: recent-uploads
commands.title: Recent Uploads
commands.subtitle: View and copy links to your recently uploaded files
commands.description: View and copy links to your recently uploaded files.

commands.name: upload-clipboard
commands.title: Upload from Clipboard
commands.subtitle: Upload file/image from clipboard to cloud
commands.description: Upload the file or image currently in your clipboard to your default cloud provider.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
